io.permazen.core

Class Layout

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.permazen.core.Layout

  • public final class Layout
extends Object
    Constants and utility methods relating to the encoding and layout of a Database in a key/value store.

    The key/value space is divided into a data area and a meta-data area. The data area contains object data as well as simple and composite index data. The meta-data area contains a recognizable signature, encoding format version, each recorded schema version, the object version index data, and a range reserved for user applications.

    See Also:
    LAYOUT.txt

        decoded schema
        Throws:

      • deleteObjectData

        public static void deleteObjectData(KVStore kv)
        Delete all object and index data from the given KVStore.

        Upon return, the KVStore will still contain meta-data, but not any objects.

        Parameters:
        kv - key/value database

      • copyMetaData

        public static void copyMetaData(KVStore src,
                                KVStore dst)
        Copy non-object meta-data from one KVStore to another.

        This copies all meta-data except the object version index. Any existing key/value pairs in the destination meta-data range are not removed prior to the copy.

        Parameters:
        src - source key/value database
        dst - destination key/value database
